name: Greed, Gluttony, and Everything IMPbetween
description: This my entry to WeightGaming's Gain Jam #5: Greed. Try your best to rank up imps and collect souls while managing your gold and brimstone! Collect artifacts, royal coins, and prestige bonuses while you aim for your own vague goal for greed, gluttony, and IMPractical nonsense!
